abstract: Stock market takes biggest tumble of week, capping four-day losing streak, as investors continue to display uneasiness over cautious corporate outlooks and weak sales.
lead_paragraph: With Friday’s decline, the S.&P. 500 will have had its fourth losing week out of the last five.

headline.main: Market Continues to Fade With Another Weekly Loss
headline.print_headline: Sluggish Sales End a Week of Losses

snippet: With Friday’s decline, the S.&P. 500 will have had its fourth losing week out of the last five.
